import { React, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Spinner from '../../../Components/UI/Spinner/Spinner'; import { getAllTransfers, updateTransfer } from '../../../store/transfers-slice'; export default function AllTransfers() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { transfers, statusUpdateLoading, loading, transferError, alert } = useSelector((state) => state.transfers); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getAllTransfers()); }, [dispatch]); // useEffect(() => { // //const updatedTransfer = userTransfers.find((element) => element._id == id); // console.log(transfers); // }, [transfers]); const [status, setStatus] = useState(""); const handleStatusUpdate = async (e, id) => { e.preventDefault(); const update = { id: id, status: { adminStatus: status, } }; await dispatch(updateTransfer(update)); console.log(transfers); }; const onStatusChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setStatus(e.target.value); }; return (
{loading ? : ( {transfers.length > 0 ? (transfers.map((transfer) => ( ))) :

No Transfers Made

}
Owner Info Buyer Info Land Info Status Change Status
Name: {transfer?.seller?.name}
Email: {transfer?.seller?.email}
Name: {transfer?.buyer?.name}
Email: {transfer?.buyer?.email}
Address: {transfer?.land?.address}
Area: {transfer?.land?.area} Sqft
Buyer Status: {transfer.status.buyerStatus}
Seller Status: {transfer.status.sellerStatus}
Admin Status: {transfer.status.adminStatus}
handleStatusUpdate(e, transfer._id)}>
)}
); }
